sentences.sContent: She felt too apathetic even to move.
sentences.sCn: 她毫无兴趣，甚至连动都不想动。

synos.tran: 冷漠的；无动于衷的，缺乏兴趣的

words.tran: 冷淡地；无动于衷地；不感兴趣地
冷漠，无兴趣，漠不关心；无感情

trans.tranCn: 缺乏兴趣的, 缺乏感情的, 无动于衷的
trans.tranOther: not interested in something, and not willing to make any effort to change or improve things
